name: Interkosmos
description: Interkosmos is an arcady astronaut adventure in VR. Brace yourself for a rush of hectic gameplay to challenge your inner cosmonaut, and a fun story full of twists and Cold War absurdities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers / Oculus Rift HMD and Remote or Touch
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or higher Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 or better DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Vive HMD and controllers / Oculus Rift HMD and Remote or Touch
